TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SignInRequestMessage extends System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage

summary.span: 代表「WS-同盟登入要求」訊息。

span.span: Represents a WS-Federation Sign-In Request message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WS-同盟登入訊息是要求安全性權杖，由信賴憑證者 (RP) 傳送至安全性權杖服務 (STS)。A WS-Federation sign-in message is sent by a relying party (RP) to a security token service (STS) to request a security token. Wa 參數必須設定為"wsignout1.0"和 wtrealm 參數應該設定為要求的資源 （通常是要求之資源的 URL） 的安全性領域。The wa parameter must be set to "wsignout1.0" and the wtrealm parameter should be set to the security realm of the requested resource (this is often the URL of the requested resource). 也可能會在要求中指定其他選擇性參數。Other optional parameters may also be specified in the request. A訊息的建立方式的靜態方法類別，例如方法中，當 wa 參數設定為"wsignin1.0"時，沒有任何 wresult 或 wresultptr 參數存在，並為 wtrealm 參數或有 wreply 參數。A message is created by the static methods of the class, for example the method, when the wa parameter is set to "wsignin1.0", there is no wresult or wresultptr parameter present, and either a wtrealm parameter or a wreply parameter is present. > [!IMPORTANT] > Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) 1.0 版的回溯相容性，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 可讓是 wtrealm 參數或 wreply 參數，設定 （或兩者） 為有效; 登入訊息不過，WS-同盟通訊協定需要 wtrealm 參數會出現在 登入要求。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大部分情況下，您應該確定，會指定 wtrealm 參數。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified. 類別會公開數個可用來設定或存取個別的訊息參數的屬性。The class exposes several properties that can be used to set or access individual message parameters. 這些參數也可以設定或透過存取字典。These parameters can also be set or accessed through the dictionary. 例如，您也可以閱讀訊息中的 wtrealm 參數是屬性或做為索引鍵中指定 」 wtrealm"字典。For example, you can read the wtrealm parameter in the message either through the property or by specifying "wtrealm" as the key to the dictionary. [!INCLUDE[wif_wsfed_ref](~/includes/wif-wsfed-ref-md.md)] ## Examples [!code-csharp[WifSignInMessage#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifsigninmessage/cs/webapplication1/default.aspx.cs#2)]

summary.span: 支援建立非標準訊息以提供回溯相容性。

span.span: Supports non-standard message creation for backward compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wa 訊息參數 (屬性) 會初始化為"wsignin1.0"。The wa message parameter (the property) is initialized to "wsignin1.0". 支援建立非標準訊息以提供回溯相容性。Supports non-standard message creation for backward compatibility. 在典型的案例中，您必須指定 wtrealm 訊息參數。In the typical case, a wtrealm message parameter must be specified. 這個建構函式可讓只有 wreply 訊息參數來指定 Active Directory 同盟服務 (AD FS) 1.0 版的回溯相容性。This constructor allows only a wreply message parameter to be specified for backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Service (AD FS) version 1.0.

exception.span: 和 都是 或空字串。

span.span: Both and are or an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AuthenticationType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AuthenticationType : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息的 wauth 參數。

span.span: Gets or sets the wauth parameter of the message.
The authentication type.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wauth 參數就像是在 Ws-trust 中定義的 wst: authenticationtype 項目。The wauth parameter is like the wst:AuthenticationType element defined in WS-Trust. 值應該設定為字串，包含識別所用的驗證類型的 URI。The value should be set to a string that contains a URI that identifies the type of authentication that is used. Wauth 參數是選擇性的。The wauth parameter is optional. 設定屬性設`null`或空字串來移除訊息的 wauth 參數。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wauth parameter from the message.

exception.span: 發生設定並非有效絕對 URI 之值的嘗試。

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CurrentTime { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CurrentTime : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息的 wct 參數。

span.span: Gets or sets the wct parameter of the message.

value.span: 指定為 UTC 日期時間字串的 wct 參數的值。

span.span: The value of the wct parameter specified as a datetime string in UTC.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wct 參數指定的訊息已建立的執行個體的目前時間。The wct parameter specifies the current time at the instant that the message was created. Wct 參數是選擇性的。The wct parameter is optional. 設定為屬性`null`或空字串的 wct 參數移除訊息。Set to the property `null` or an empty string to remove the wct parameter from the message.

exception.span: 發生設定並非有效日期時間字串之值的嘗試。

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid datetime string occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Federation { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Federation : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息的 wfed 參數。

span.span: Gets or sets the wfed parameter of the message.
The value of the wfed parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wfed 參數會指定訊息的同盟內容。The wfed parameter specifies the federation context for the message. Wfed 參數是選擇性的。The wfed parameter is optional. 設定為屬性`null`或空字串來移除訊息的 wfed 參數。Set to the property `null` or an empty string to remove the wfed parameter from the message.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Freshness { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Freshness : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息的 wfresh 參數。

span.span: Gets or sets the wfresh parameter of the message.
The value of the wfresh parameter.

value.span: 這應該是整數，表示為字串。

span.span: This should be an integer represented as a string.

value.span: 它會指定驗證有效的最長保留期限 (以分鐘為單位)。

span.span: It specifies the maximum age in minutes that the authentication is valid.

value.span: 零表示語彙基元發出之前，會提示使用者。

span.span: Zero indicates that the user should be prompted before the token is issued.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wfresh 參數會指出以驗證的有效分鐘為單位的最長使用期限。The wfresh parameter indicates the maximum age in minutes that the authentication is valid. Wfresh 參數是選擇性的。The wfresh parameter is optional. 設定屬性設`null`或空字串來移除訊息的 wfresh 參數。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wfresh parameter from the message.

exception.span: 嘗試設定並非整數之字串表示的值。

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a string representation of an integer.

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息的 whr 參數。

span.span: Gets or sets the whr parameter of the message.
The value of the whr parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Whr 參數識別要用於要求的識別提供者的安全性領域。The whr parameter identifies the security realm of the identity provider to use for the request. 它可以指定為要使用 IP STS 的 URL 或了解要求的收件者的識別項。It can be specified as the URL of the IP-STS to use or as an identifier that is understood by the receiver of the request. Whr 參數是選擇性的套屬性設`null`或空字串來移除訊息的 whr 參數。The whr parameter is optional Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the whr parameter from the message.

member this.Policy : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息的 wp 參數。

span.span: Gets or sets the wp parameter of the message.
The value of the wp parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 識別要用於要求的原則。Identifies the policy to be used for the request. 它通常適用於動作 （wa 參數），但可能會有更廣泛的影響。It typically applies to the action (wa parameter), but may have broader implications. Wp 參數是選擇性的。The wp parameter is optional. 設定屬性設`null`或空字串來移除訊息的 wp 參數。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wp parameter from the message.

exception.span: 發生設定並非有效絕對 URI 之值的嘗試。

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息的 wtrealm 參數。

span.span: Gets or sets the wtrealm parameter of the message.
The value of the wtrealm parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wtrealm 參數會指定屬於所要求的資源的安全性領域。The wtrealm parameter specifies the security realm to which the requested resource belongs. 這通常是要求之資源的 URL。This is often the URL of the requested resource. > [!IMPORTANT] > Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) 1.0 版的回溯相容性，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 可讓是 wtrealm 參數或 wreply 參數，設定 （或兩者） 為有效; 登入訊息不過，WS-同盟通訊協定需要 wtrealm 參數會出現在 登入要求。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大部分情況下，您應該確定，會指定 wtrealm 參數。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified. 設定屬性設`null`或空字串來移除訊息的 wtrealm 參數。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wtrealm parameter from the message.

exception.span: 發生設定並非有效絕對 URI 之值的嘗試。

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Reply { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Reply : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息的 wreply 參數。

span.span: Gets or sets the wreply parameter of the message.
The value of the wreply parameter.
This is specified as a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含回應應重新導向的 URI。Contains the URI to which responses should be directed. Wtrealm 參數通常用來指定此 URI。The wtrealm parameter is often used to specify this URI. 不過，在更複雜的情況下，wtrealm 參數可以用來指定要求，例如，整個網站，安全性領域，而且 wreply 參數可用來指定特定的資源，在該領域，例如文件、 頁面上，或端點。However, in more complex scenarios, the wtrealm parameter can be used to specify the security realm for the request, for example, the entire web site, and the wreply parameter can be used to specify a specific resource within that realm, for example, a document, page, or endpoint. Wreply 參數是選擇性的。The wreply parameter is optional. 設定屬性設`null`或空字串來移除訊息的 wreply 參數。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wreply parameter from the message. > [!IMPORTANT] > Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) 1.0 版的回溯相容性，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 可讓是 wtrealm 參數或 wreply 參數，設定 （或兩者） 為有效; 登入訊息不過，WS-同盟通訊協定需要 wtrealm 參數會出現在 登入要求。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大部分情況下，您應該確定，會指定 wtrealm 參數。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified.

exception.span: 發生設定並非有效絕對 URI 之值的嘗試。

span.span: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

summary.span: 取得或設定訊息的 wreq 參數。

span.span: Gets or sets the wreq parameter of the message.
The value of the wreq parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wreq 參數指定使用的權杖要求``項目或完整的要求訊息 1.1、WS-Trust 中所述。The wreq parameter specifies a token request using either a `` element or a full request message as described in WS-Trust. Wreq 參數是選擇性的。The wreq parameter is optional. 設定屬性設`null`或空字串來移除訊息的 wreq 參數。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wreq parameter from the message. 如果指定屬性，無法指定屬性。If the property is specified, the property cannot be specified.

span.span: Gets or sets the wreqptr parameter of the message.
The value of the wreqptr parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定指出哪裡可以找到以表示該要求的 URL``項目。Specifies a URL that indicates where to find the request expressed as a `` element. Wreqptr 參數是選擇性的。The wreqptr parameter is optional. 設定屬性設`null`或空字串來移除訊息的 wreqptr 參數。Set the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wreqptr parameter from the message. 如果指定屬性，無法指定屬性。If the property is specified, the property cannot be specified.

summary.span: 取得對應至此訊息的 URL 字串表示。

span.span: Gets a string representation of the URL that corresponds to this message.

value.span: 從目前執行個體序列化的 URL。

span.span: A URL serialized from the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字串會包含由序列化目前的執行個體的 URL （包括查詢參數）。The string contains a URL (including query parameters) that is created by serializing the current instance. 方法會叫用來執行序列化。The method is invoked to perform the serialization.

span.span: Gets or sets the wres parameter of the message.
The value of the wres parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定要存取資源的 URL。Specifies the URL for the resource to be accessed. Wres 參數是傳統的參數。The wres parameter is a legacy parameter. 一般而言，wtrealm 參數 (屬性) 會改為使用。Typically, the wtrealm parameter (the property) is used instead. Wres 參數是選擇性的。The wres parameter is optional. 設定為屬性設`null`或空字串來移除訊息的 wres 參數。Set to the property to `null` or an empty string to remove the wres parameter from the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) 1.0 版的回溯相容性，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 可讓是 wtrealm 參數或 wreply 參數，設定 （或兩者） 為有效; 登入訊息不過，WS-同盟通訊協定需要 wtrealm 參數會出現在 登入要求。For backward compatibility with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) version 1.0, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) allows either the wtrealm parameter or the wreply parameter to be set (or both) for a sign-in message to be valid; however, the WS-Federation protocol requires that the wtrealm parameter be present in a sign-in request. 在大部分情況下，您應該確定，會指定 wtrealm 參數。In most scenarios, you should ensure that the wtrealm parameter is specified.

span.span: The to which to write the message.

summary.span: 將這個查詢字串格式的訊息寫入至指定的文字寫入器。

span.span: Writes this message in query string form to the specified text writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫方法，然後再寫入訊息。This method calls the method before writing the message.

span.span: is .
